titleStmt.title: Description of University of Pennsylvania Oversize Ms. Codex 1256: Legal records

msIdentifier.repository: Kislak Center for Special Collections, Rare Books and Manuscripts

msContents.summary: A series of legal records of the Bagnano family, dated from 1493 to 1604. There is a table of contents on the inside of the upper and lower covers, listing the years, page numbers, and brief descriptions of the records in Italian. A collection of legal records, mostly consisting of wills, contracts, deeds, and inheritances. Some of the records include disagreements over inheritance, and others deal with claims of various monasteries in Florence. The family is sometimes referred to as Albagnano. Many of the records are notarized and contain notarial signets. Contains some marginal notes in a near-contemporary hand.

supportDesc.extent: 88 leaves : 285 x 210 (240-250 x 180) mm. bound to 288 x 213 mm

collation.p: Parchment, 88; 1-4¹⁰ 5-10⁸; 1-11, [i], 12-84, [iii]; 1-11, [i], 84, [iii]; contemporary foliation in ink, modern foliation in pencil, upper right recto.

scriptDesc.scriptNote: Written in a variety of cursive and secretarial hands.

decoDesc.decoNote: Contains some initials with foliate decoration (example, f. 14v); manicules in margins throughout.

history.provenance: Formerly owned by Prince Piero Ginor Conti (bookplate, inside lower cover).
